A powerful Chrome extension designed for precise, in-browser SEO analysis.

Built for SEO consultants, digital marketers, content creators, and website owners, this tool provides a reliable way to assess and improve essential SEO elements directly within the browser. Whether optimizing content, evaluating webpages, or conducting competitor analysis, the On-Page SEO Checker delivers actionable insights to enhance search engine visibility.

Features

1️⃣ Meta Tag Analysis 📝

 • Evaluates meta titles and descriptions for optimal length, following SEO best practices:
✔️ Green for optimal length.
❌ Red for too short or too long.
This feature helps identify issues that could impact click-through rates and search rankings.

2️⃣ Canonical and Hreflang Tag Verification 🌍

 • Scans for canonical tags to ensure proper setup, avoiding duplicate content issues.
 • Analyzes hreflang attributes for multilingual or multi-regional websites, confirming correct targeting for different languages or locations.

3️⃣ Heading Structure Analysis 🔢

 • Reviews all headings (H1 to H6) in hierarchical order.
 • Highlights missing H1 tags or improper heading structures, ensuring pages meet both SEO and readability standards.

4️⃣ Word Count and Link Analysis 🔗

 • Calculates the total word count of the page, a critical factor for SEO relevance.
 • Counts and categorizes links:
🔗 Internal Links: Those pointing within the same domain.
🌐 External Links: Links leading to other domains.
This helps ensure a balanced linking strategy for optimal SEO performance.

5️⃣ Published and Modified Dates, Author, and Publisher 🕒

 • Extracts published and last modified dates from metadata for content tracking.
 • Retrieves author and publisher information to verify content attribution.

6️⃣ Data Storage and Tab Management 💾

 • Temporarily stores SEO data using Chrome’s local storage for seamless analysis across tabs.
 • Automatically clears data when switching tabs to maintain relevance and avoid clutter.

7️⃣ User Interface and Real-Time Alerts ⚡

 • Provides a clean, intuitive popup interface for instant access to SEO insights.
 • Displays real-time alerts for key SEO issues, enabling quick resolution directly in the browser.

Why Use the On-Page SEO Checker?

🚀 Save Time: Analyze and resolve SEO issues without leaving your browser.
📈 Improve Content Quality: Validate metadata, headings, and other elements against best practices.
🔍 Boost Search Rankings: Ensure your pages are optimized for search engines with actionable data.
🔒 Secure and Private: All analysis is performed locally, with no data collection or external transmission.

The On-Page SEO Checker by k-o.pro is an essential tool for anyone aiming to optimize their online presence. With its comprehensive feature set, it simplifies SEO auditing and ensures adherence to best practices for effective, impactful web optimization.
